tasks.title: Create Life Event Object
tasks.description: Create a custom object named 'Life Event' with fields: Event Name (Text), Event Date (Date), and Contact (Lookup). Set sharing model to Private.
acceptance_criteria: Sharing model is set to Private

tasks.title: Set Up Email Notification Flow
tasks.description: Create a Flow that triggers an email notification to the associated Contact when a new Life Event record is created.
acceptance_criteria: Email is sent upon creation of Life Event

tasks.title: Configure Security Settings for Life Event
tasks.description: Set profile permissions for the Life Event object to be visible only to System Admin. Ensure permissions for Read, Create, Edit, and Delete are configured.
acceptance_criteria: Security settings are applied to the profile

tasks.title: Create Page Layout for Life Event
tasks.description: Create a page layout for the Life Event object that includes the following fields: Event Name, Event Date, and Contact. Assign the layout to the System Admin profile.
acceptance_criteria: Page layout is created and assigned
Fields are present on the layout

tasks.title: Testing and Validation
tasks.description: Conduct testing for the creation of Life Event records and the associated email notification Flow. Validate that all components function as expected.
acceptance_criteria: Life Event record can be created successfully
All security and visibility settings are validated

key_risks: Delays in object creation could postpone subsequent tasks
Potential issues in Flow might lead to miscommunication
Incorrect profile permission settings may result in unauthorized access
success_criteria: Life Event object is fully functional
User feedback confirms UI is intuitive
